hymn.title: Praying to express the Lord (Alternate Tune)

layout.singingstanza: Pray -- ing to ex -- press the Lord, We must not our -- selves ex -- press, But let Christ re -- veal Him -- self, His de -- sire in us im -- press.

lyrics.stanza: Praying to express the Lord, We must not ourselves express, But let Christ reveal Himself, His desire in us impress.
Praying to express the Lord, We must utter His intent, Quieting our human thoughts That with His our mind be blent.
Praying to express the Lord, Ever looking unto Him As a mirror to reflect All His glory from within.
Praying to express the Lord, Letting Him beseech in us; Christ indwelling prays within To the Christ in heaven thus.
Praying to express the Lord, Learning not to pray by self, Praying wholly with the Lord, Praying only by Himself.
